channel.title: Can not log onto any servers
channel.description:
Ok, so first time user of Moparscape. I tried, and failed, at setting my own private server up for my own use, and it has not worked. So, I've tried using the servers listed on this site's server checklist or whatever. Nothing works. Just says I'm logged in already, try another name. I have the downloaded client.
EDIT: The ONLY time I've been able to run a private runescape client was with moparscapes new beta 4.1 version. Only thing, I can't add any items to that server. I'm really confused as to why I can't seem to log onto any server I find. At all. PLEASE help.

item.title: Can not log onto any servers
item.dc:creator: @shmeves16 shmeves16
item.description:
@shmeves16 wrote:

Ok, so first time user of Moparscape.
I tried, and failed, at setting my own private server up for my own use, and it has not worked.
So, I’ve tried using the servers listed on this site’s server checklist or whatever. Nothing works. Just says I’m logged in already, try another name. I have the downloaded client.

EDIT: The ONLY time I’ve been able to run a private runescape client was with moparscapes new beta 4.1 version. Only thing, I can’t add any items to that server. I’m really confused as to why I can’t seem to log onto any server I find. At all. PLEASE help.
